param.name: default_asset_groups
param.label: Default Asset Groups
param.description: Comma separated list of default asset groups to create when creating a new unit using the instructor builder.

param.name: section_grade_policy
param.label: Can section owners edit grading policy?
param.description: Specify whether or not section owners are allowed to editing the grading policy for their section. If no, policy inteface only shows up for course instructors.

param.name: auto_approve
param.label: Auto Approve Courses:?
param.description: Courses are auto approved at creation. Otherwise Hub administrator must manually approve course.

param.name: email_comment_processing
param.label: Enable discussion comments via E-mail
param.description: Enable logic to send course discussion comments via email and process and add responses via email

param.name: email_member_coursesidcussionemail_autosignup
param.label: Enable courses to auto setup new members to receive discussion email by default
param.description: Automatically setup new course users to get email from the course discussions

param.name: intro_mycourses
param.label: Show My Courses
param.description: Display list of my courses on course landing page?

param.name: intro_interestingcourses
param.label: Show Interesting Courses
param.description: Display list of courses having matching tags as the user on the course landing page?

param.name: intro_popularcourses
param.label: Show Popular Courses
param.description: Display list of popular courses on course landing page?
